description: Nginx access log analytics dashboard using Promtail and Loki v2+. Prometheus datasource is created from Loki service.

targets.expr: count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({host="$host", http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",  http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" , remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" , remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" , remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*",  http_user_agent != "worldping-api" ,  request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" ,  request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php", remote_addr!="" } [1h])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({host="$host", http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",  http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" , remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" , remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" , remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*",  http_user_agent != "worldping-api" ,  request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" ,  request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" } [1d])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({host="$host", http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",  http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" , remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" , remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" , remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*",  http_user_agent != "worldping-api" ,  request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" ,  request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php", remote_addr!="" } [2d])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({host="$host", http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",  http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" , remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" , remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" , remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*",  http_user_agent != "worldping-api" ,  request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" ,  request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" ,  request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" } [7d])))
sum by(host) (count_over_time({host="$host"}[$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({host="$host",status!="", app="ingress-nginx"}[$__auto]))
sum(rate({host="$host", status=~"5[0-9][0-9]"}[$__interval])) / (sum(rate({host="$host"} [$__interval])) / 100)
sum(rate({host="$host", status=~"4[0-9][0-9]"}[$__interval])) / (sum(rate({host="$host"} [$__interval])) / 100)
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({host="$host", status="200"} | unwrap body_bytes_sent [$__interval]))

{host="$host", request_uri !="", 
 http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*", 
 http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*", 
 remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", 
 remote_addr != "62.210.149.41", 
 remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*", 
 remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*", 
 http_user_agent != "worldping-api", 
 request_uri !~ "/wp-.*", 
 request_uri !~ "//wp-.*", 
 request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*", 
 request_uri !~ "/robots.txt", 
 request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php",
 status =~ "5[0-9][0-9]"
} | line_format "request for {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} from {{.remote_addr}}."

{host="$host", request_uri !="", 
 http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*", 
 http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*", 
 remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*", 
 remote_addr != "62.210.149.41", 
 remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*", 
 remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*", 
 http_user_agent != "worldping-api", 
 request_uri !~ "/wp-.*", 
 request_uri !~ "//wp-.*", 
 request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*", 
 request_uri !~ "/robots.txt", 
 request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php"
} | line_format "request for {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} from {{.remote_addr}}."

topk(5, sum by (remote_addr) (
  count_over_time({
    host="$host",
    remote_addr != "",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*",
    remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*",
    remote_addr !="62.210.149.41",
    remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*",
    remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*",
    http_user_agent != "worldping-api",
    request_uri !~ "/wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "//wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*",
    request_uri !~ "/robots.txt",
    request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php"
  } [$__interval])
))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (
  count_over_time({
    request_uri !="",
    host="$host",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*",
    request_uri != "/",
    request_uri !~ "/wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "//wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*",
    request_uri !~ "/robots.txt",
    request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php"
  }[$__interval])
))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (
  count_over_time({
    request_uri = "/health-check/",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*",
    request_uri != "/",
    request_uri !~ "/wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "//wp-.*",
    request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*",
    request_uri !~ "/robots.txt",
    request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php"
  }[$__interval])
))
topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({host=~"$host", http_user_agent!=""} [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (http_referr) (
  count_over_time({
    host="$host",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*",
    http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*",
    http_user_agent != "worldping-api",
    http_referr != "",
    http_referr !~ ".*?panxora.*?",
    http_referr != "http://192.168.120.55:9000/"
  } [$__interval])
))

panels.title: Top HTTP Referers - Exclude Panxora Site

targets.expr: max by (http_referr,request_uri) (quantile_over_time(0.99, {host="$host", request_time!=""} | unwrap request_time [$__interval]))

panels.title: 99th percentile of Request Time by Request Uri

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({host="$host", status!=""} [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({host="$host", status="200"} | unwrap body_bytes_sent [$__interval]))

title: Analytics - NGINX
